net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy

Class UncertaintySamplingQueryStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.querystrategy.AbstractQueryStrategy
      • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy.AbstractSingleLabelQueryStrategy
        • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy.UncertaintySamplingQueryStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IConfigure, IQueryStrategy, JCLAL
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntropySamplingQueryStrategy, LeastConfidentSamplingQueryStrategy, MarginSamplingQueryStrategy

    public abstract class UncertaintySamplingQueryStrategy
extends AbstractSingleLabelQueryStrategy
    Abstract class for Uncertainty Sampling family of query strategies. The uncertainty sampling family of query strategies is considered the simplest and commonly used query strategy. The instances about the active learner is least certain are labeled. D. Lewis and W. Gale. A sequential algorithm for training text classifiers. In Proceedings of the ACM SIGIR Conference on Research and Development in Information Retrieval, pages 3â€“12. ACM/Springer, 1994.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
